title: JSON Schema for Food Product metadata

Name.description: Name of the product that exactly matches one in the USDA database.

FixedAmountG.description: Non-negotiable, fixed amount of the product.

MinAmountG.description: Hard limit for minimum amount of the product.

MaxAmountG.description: Hard limit for maximum amount of the product.

StartAmountG.description: Hint for optimizer telling where to start.

Comment.description: Comment for myself, not used in optimization.
